instruction: Analyze this tactical situation: role='fullback', phase='transition', opposition_shape='4-4-2', our_shape='4-3-3', pressure='high', width_state='balanced', lanes='open', tempo='fast', final_third=false, overload_left=true, overload_right=true, options='two_options', marking='mixed', def_block='high_press', nearby_defenders=0, nearby_teammates=4, winger_inside=false, overlap_window=false.
response: Priority actions: • Take first touch forward if possible; release early before the trap closes. • Punch through the open lane with positive first touch and tempo. • If 2v1, delay and angle to wait for the 8 to recover. • Arrive, don’t wait, on crosses; deliver early if box is loaded.

instruction: Analyze this tactical situation: role='fullback', phase='transition', opposition_shape='4-4-2', our_shape='4-3-3', pressure='low', width_state='narrow', lanes='open', tempo='fast', final_third=true, overload_left=false, overload_right=true, options='multiple', marking='tight', def_block='low_block', nearby_defenders=2, nearby_teammates=3, winger_inside=false, overlap_window=true.
response: Focus on: • Be patient; draw a line out and play through once a lane opens. • Punch through the open lane with positive first touch and tempo. • Support underneath to recycle; trigger switch to weak side. • Check shoulder before stepping; don’t break the line alone.

instruction: Analyze this tactical situation: role='fullback', phase='defend', opposition_shape='3-4-3', our_shape='3-5-2', pressure='low', width_state='wide', lanes='half_open', tempo='fast', final_third=false, overload_left=true, overload_right=true, options='two_options', marking='loose', def_block='high_press', nearby_defenders=2, nearby_teammates=1, winger_inside=true, overlap_window=false.
response: Do the simple things fast: • Be patient; draw a line out and play through once a lane opens. • Use disguised passes or third-man combinations to exploit half-spaces. • When isolated, invite contact then slip down the line. • Check shoulder before stepping; don’t break the line alone.

instruction: Analyze this tactical situation: role='fullback', phase='build_up', opposition_shape='3-4-3', our_shape='3-4-3', pressure='low', width_state='wide', lanes='blocked', tempo='fast', final_third=true, overload_left=true, overload_right=true, options='limited', marking='loose', def_block='high_press', nearby_defenders=2, nearby_teammates=2, winger_inside=true, overlap_window=true.

instruction: Analyze this tactical situation: role='fullback', phase='transition', opposition_shape='3-4-3', our_shape='3-4-3', pressure='high', width_state='wide', lanes='blocked', tempo='controlled', final_third=true, overload_left=true, overload_right=true, options='multiple', marking='tight', def_block='high_press', nearby_defenders=2, nearby_teammates=1, winger_inside=false, overlap_window=true.
response: Coachable points: • Take first touch forward if possible; release early before the trap closes. • Recycle and switch the point of attack to move the block. • Arrive, don’t wait, on crosses; deliver early if box is loaded. • When isolated, invite contact then slip down the line.

instruction: Analyze this tactical situation: role='fullback', phase='build_up', opposition_shape='3-5-2', our_shape='4-4-2', pressure='low', width_state='wide', lanes='open', tempo='fast', final_third=true, overload_left=true, overload_right=true, options='multiple', marking='loose', def_block='low_block', nearby_defenders=2, nearby_teammates=3, winger_inside=false, overlap_window=false.

instruction: Analyze this tactical situation: role='fullback', phase='build_up', opposition_shape='4-3-3', our_shape='3-5-2', pressure='low', width_state='wide', lanes='half_open', tempo='slow', final_third=true, overload_left=true, overload_right=true, options='limited', marking='tight', def_block='mid_block', nearby_defenders=3, nearby_teammates=4, winger_inside=true, overlap_window=false.
response: Key actions: • Be patient; draw a line out and play through once a lane opens. • Use disguised passes or third-man combinations to exploit half-spaces. • Overlap if winger drives inside; underlap if wide lane is blocked. • On regain, play forward within two touches if lane is open.

instruction: Analyze this tactical situation: role='fullback', phase='transition', opposition_shape='4-4-2', our_shape='3-4-3', pressure='high', width_state='balanced', lanes='half_open', tempo='controlled', final_third=true, overload_left=true, overload_right=false, options='limited', marking='mixed', def_block='mid_block', nearby_defenders=0, nearby_teammates=1, winger_inside=false, overlap_window=false.
response: Focus on: • Take first touch forward if possible; release early before the trap closes. • Use disguised passes or third-man combinations to exploit half-spaces. • Coordinate with winger: one goes, one secures rest defense. • Close out with outside shoulder; force play to the touchline.

instruction: Analyze this tactical situation: role='fullback', phase='attack', opposition_shape='4-2-3-1', our_shape='4-3-3', pressure='moderate', width_state='wide', lanes='open', tempo='controlled', final_third=true, overload_left=true, overload_right=false, options='two_options', marking='tight', def_block='high_press', nearby_defenders=3, nearby_teammates=4, winger_inside=true, overlap_window=false.
response: Immediate cues: • Scan early and adjust body to play forward or recycle as needed. • Punch through the open lane with positive first touch and tempo. • Check shoulder before stepping; don’t break the line alone. • Coordinate with winger: one goes, one secures rest defense.

response: Execution detail: • Scan early and adjust body to play forward or recycle as needed. • Use disguised passes or third-man combinations to exploit half-spaces. • Overlap if winger drives inside; underlap if wide lane is blocked. • Close out with outside shoulder; force play to the touchline.
